search.query: eventtype=cisco_ios-duplex_mismatch | dedup dvc,cdp_local_interface | table _time,dvc,cdp_local_interface,cdp_neighbor,dest_interface,message_text | rename cdp_local_interface AS "Local Int.",cdp_neighbor AS "CDP Neighbor",dest_interface AS "Remote Int.",message_text AS "Message" | sort dvc

eventtype="cisco_ios-native_vlan_mismatch" | dedup host,cdp_local_interface | table _time,host,cdp_local_interface,cdp_local_vlan,cdp_neighbor,cdp_remote_interface,cdp_remote_vlan | rename cdp_local_interface AS "Local Int.",cdp_local_vlan AS "Local VLAN",cdp_neighbor AS "CDP Neighbor",cdp_remote_interface AS "Remote Int.",cdp_remote_vlan AS "Remote VLAN",message_text AS "Message"

eventtype="cisco_ios-cdp_neighbor_added" OR eventtype=cisco_ios-cdp_neighbor_removed | dedup host,cdp_local_interface | table host,cdp_local_interface,cdp_remote_dvc,cdp_remote_dvc_serial,cdp_remote_interface,cdp_remote_ip,cdp_remote_ip_mgmt,mnemonic | sort host,cdp_local_interface
